Impaling Blow.name: Impaling Blow
Impaling Blow.flavor: Your precise blow transfixes your enemy.
Impaling Blow.special: You can shift 2 squares before making this attack.
Impaling Blow.attack: Strength vs. AC or Dexterity vs. AC
Impaling Blow.onHit: 3[W] + Strength or Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Deadwalker Instant Escape.name: Deadwalker Instant Escape
Deadwalker Instant Escape.flavor: You know how to slip out of an unwanted embrace.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: You are grabbed.  Effect: You escape the grab and shift 2 squares.
Deadwalker Instant Escape.effect: You escape the grab and shift 2 squares.

Deadeye Strike.name: Deadeye Strike
Deadeye Strike.flavor: With careful aim, you strike a decisive blow at your enemyâ€™s weakest spot.
Deadeye Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC or Dexterity vs. AC
Deadeye Strike.special: When using this power, you score a critical hit on a natural attack roll of 18 or higher.
